name: Home Jam
description:
Home Jam: A game about attending a game jam with friends from your hometown. The story starts 7 days before the submission deadline. Hurry up and convince your friends to attend the game jam with you.

Story: Mo Razian and Taulant Sulko
Art: Taulant Sulko
Programming: Mo Razian
Music: Bensound, Creative Commons License 
Date: January 27th, 2019
Created for Global Game Jam 2019
